website_summaries.verdict: These kids' walkie-talkies are simple to use and built to last.
pros: Each walkie-talkie can be used as external microphone and earpiece
Flashlight and backlit LED display for use in the dark
cons: Low volume even at the highest volume setting

customer_reviews.title: They have survived a group of 8 & 10 year olds
customer_reviews.text: These were a birthday present and have suffered untold abuse perpetrated by an active group of kids. I have no doubts they’ve been dropped during the course of their great adventures and banged off God knows what. Despite all that, they have very minimal battle scarring and still work just as they did out of the box. My stock pile of batteries is still healthy and the kids are still happy. Parenting win!
customer_reviews.author: Bree

customer_reviews.title: Good little radios, but with very loud chirps
customer_reviews.text: These are solid little two-way radios. They seem robust and durable, and look great. The controls aren't very intuitive or especially easy to use, even after following the enclosed instructions. And some of the extra features don't seem to work as expected. Also, the chirp alerts from these things are LOUD! And I've never been able to figure out how to turn them down (the instructions to do this didn't work). But the sound quality is good, and they have plenty of channels so there's not much problem with interference. Overall they are decent.
customer_reviews.author: Just Some Guy

customer_reviews.title: Don't text, talk!!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his b-day and we have had a blast with them. Played with them for a bit before it got cold but they have worked great. I can send him across the street behind neighbors houses and have no problems hearing him. Also went on our local bike/walking trail and he was well ahead of me and was working flawlessly. Been dropped a few times but still keep on going. Very rugged and great reception!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Good but definitely NOT for kids
customer_reviews.text: As walkie talkies, these are a great value. I'm not sure why they are marketed as "for kids". The insanely cryptic and complex menu system coupled with several front facing buttons to manipulate the menu, means my kids changed the functions every time they touch it. Slight changes in the menu make them not functional as walkie talkies. These require adult level users imo. Other than that, they are great.
customer_reviews.author: photographer

customer_reviews.title: Won’t turn on
customer_reviews.text: One of these won’t turn off after just over the return date. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, well made. Good reception.
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons are young. Almost 4, not yet 3, It’s not perfect for them ( a little advanced) but easy enough to use that they can and do use them. They love being in different parts of the house talking to each other, especially when they are in their tent or on an adventure. The quality is good enough that our daughter and son in law use them themselves also. Great price. Nicely made. I’m curious about how long batteries will last when the boys leave them on. -time will tell. I’m tempted to buy a set for my husband when he’s working with his partner.
customer_reviews.author: Jd digi

customer_reviews.title: Wish I found these a while ago!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, kids love these, Mommy and Daddy love these! We have one of those neighborhoods with tons of kids. Even though our pre-teen kids want a phone, ain’t no dice. Problem is, when you want them to come home, it’s a guessing game to find out which kids house they landed at. Problem solved! They have very good range. Our kids could be at a neighbor's house a half mile up the road and we can get them. There is a beep function that they can hear if you are trying to get them. This has allowed me to get them home without knocking on 5 doors! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Robert M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These were cool with no static. They were a bit complicated for my toddlers but for an adult they would work great. 1. Multiple channels 2. Great range on them 3. Long lasting batteries and you can buy a charger for them.
customer_reviews.author: Sav

customer_reviews.title: Good for kids
customer_reviews.text: Good for kids. My son and my nephew used these after Christmas for a week straight. They even work from different houses which was awesome. After a few weeks, the channel got changed on accident and the screen was no longer working. This meant I had to play with it for a long time to try to make the match again. Maybe I should’ve contacted the seller, but since it was Christmas we didn’t have the box anymore
customer_reviews.author: homeschool mom of four

customer_reviews.title: Amazing reach and clarity
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 9 and 7 year old for Christmas and what a hit! They love them and so does my boyfriend. They have a really far reach. We walked about a half a mile away from the house and still had great reception. These would be great for camping or hiking even. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: They are loud, more of an outdoor thing, hard to set up But once you get them going they are nice and handy, can even be used as a toy for kids
customer_reviews.author: That one user

customer_reviews.title: These aren't really good for kids
customer_reviews.text: The controls on these are hard to figure out. Kids are really confused and can't figure out what channel they are on and how to change the channel. Really poor engineering and not user friendly. They also eat batteries pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: T. Port

customer_reviews.title: Be careful if you have children!
customer_reviews.text: I got this toy for my 5 year old for her birthday and she loves playing with them with her sister but it seems we can hear other people from other walkie talkies down the street. Keep an eye on your little ones while using it!
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Breaker 19...
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my Granddaughter, she loves them. She can work these at 6 years old, so they must be easy to figure out. Price is good, build quality look good too. I would recommend these for a child, teenager or adult.
customer_reviews.author: Ernest

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Got these for the kids. The childish ones with characters always seemed to break or were otherwise cheap and would fall out of range. These are sturdy and durable. Two things that are just what my rough boys need. The range is excellent, 200 feet outdoors plus. Great reception throughout the house too.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Radios!
customer_reviews.text: We plan to use them in a theme park when my wife walks off with one of the kids and I have the other. But also because I like to go on some of the more frightening rides while my wife watches the kids. A cell phone is easy enough but this saves battery life for the cell phone and the kids get a kick out of using them.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonMan

customer_reviews.title: Good walkie talkies
customer_reviews.text: My children love these. They work for some distance and are very clear. The only negative I can say is that the channels are a little difficult to program.
customer_reviews.author: Bec

customer_reviews.title: Great for the kids
customer_reviews.text: My son uses these with his friends and they love them. They have a good distance. I also took them on vacation in FL to use when the kids went to our condo but with all the concrete walls they didn't work that great.
customer_reviews.author: KikiD26

customer_reviews.title: Simply good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a basic multi channel two way walkie talkie. It is simple to use, clear, and has pretty good range. 75 yards, with several interfering structures, is as far as we've tried, but it was still clear. If you're looking for a basic walkie talkie set, I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Keely

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my 4 yr old. They work well, are simple for kids, are extremely well made and have a great range so far. We are extremely happy with our purchase and would buy these again!
customer_reviews.author: Brynn

customer_reviews.title: Work great!
customer_reviews.text: Order these for my 4 year old daughter for her birthday! They work great and she loves them! For her age they may be a little advanced because when she hits the buttons on the front she changes the channels and I have to help her get them back on the same ones again.
customer_reviews.author: Private

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality!
customer_reviews.text: Been having them for a couple of weeks.Love the quality of sound, I have previously bought some walkie talkie from Walmart(the paw patrol ones)and they were horrible and more expensive than these. Battery lasts for a good amount of time, still haven’t changed them. My kids are playing with them like 30’ on average/day. Totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: They really enjoy them. Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got these two to join two others we already had so I can keep tabs on my kids. We take them hiking, around the house and to the store. I can send them to collect items in the grocery knowing i can get in contact. They really enjoy them. Easy to use, compact and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: maddash

customer_reviews.title: It was a gift
customer_reviews.text: I finally got a package with two of them in one. I believe that they work just fine and I appreciate the vendor sending me another one.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Vastly entertaining
customer_reviews.text: Our recipient and father used it to play "hide-and-seek" in their house. Wonderful fun.
customer_reviews.author: Rare book lover

customer_reviews.title: My 4yo nephew really liked these. Good size for his hands
customer_reviews.text: My 4yo nephew really liked these. Good size for his hands. He's still getting the hang of holding down the button while he talks then letting go to listen but he'll be able to use them for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn T.

customer_reviews.title: Great and user friendly for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product for money. My grandkids like bed these. Even the 3 year old can operate. Better than a toy
customer_reviews.author: angie2499

customer_reviews.title: Do the job
customer_reviews.text: Just got these to use for backing out our travel trailer work as expected didn't want anything expensive they work just fine
customer_reviews.author: Jana

customer_reviews.title: Average quality
customer_reviews.text: Confusing buttons for kids and adults alike. We finally found the lock button so my kids would stop changing channels. They're just ok. Sometimes you can't hear the other person very well.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Great product especially for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these walkie talkies for my son. He loves them but not as much as my husband does! The quality is great. You can hear everything very clear.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.S

customer_reviews.title: Walkie
customer_reviews.text: First pair defective which was tough at Christmas. When second set arrived January 7th kids were very happy.
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for kids! Great size! Easy to press buttons and easy to set up. The correct color was delivered, the box wasn’t damaged or broken! Don’t forget they do require 3 AAbatteries apiece.
customer_reviews.author: Millars

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend. So much better than trying to communicate by ...
customer_reviews.text: They work well up to about 3/4 - 1 mile. Past that they do not work. Worked well with no battery issues from Chicago to Kentucky twice. Would recommend. So much better than trying to communicate by cell phone while on the road when driving in tandem.
customer_reviews.author: MT

customer_reviews.title: Have none.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't end up using them. They work great. They'll make a fun Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen M. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works well at a distance
customer_reviews.text: We don’t use them as much as I thought we would because the channel is hard to change. My son changed the channel and we were picking up someone else’s conversation.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn

customer_reviews.title: It is Great
customer_reviews.text: I liked the set a lot! It was simple and easy to use and set up.👍🤜🏼🤛🏻
customer_reviews.author: Kristin A. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: These walkie talkies were originally not delivered as planned. Someone from the company contacted me and made things right immediately. Once things were sorted out they arrived the next day. My son and daughter love these. So clear and easy to use. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVED it, but the battery seems to wear down a bit quickly. Still it was a hit for Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon addicted

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Thes make for a awesome gift I bought them for my 8 year old son and when he goes to his friends house 3 blocks away I make him take it with him so I can keep in contact and let him know when it is time to come home!
customer_reviews.author: CHELSEA

customer_reviews.title: Nice size for kids they seem to enjoy seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice size for kids they seem to enjoy seem to be working well just have to be sure they stay on the same channel
customer_reviews.author: mia

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: These work great! They are functional over a long distance -- we tested them at over 200 feet outdoors.

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: This product is surprisingly incredible, the range for a kids walki talky is superb.

customer_reviews.title: Could be better.

customer_reviews.title: Great REAL walkie talkies
customer_reviews.text: I love these real walkie talkies! Easy to program and way better than the cheap character ones any where else. Volume is great and they're durable, so glad I got these and at a great price too

customer_reviews.title: It is good

customer_reviews.title: easy enough to program
customer_reviews.text: So far, holding up to use by a 5 and 8 year old! Works well, easy enough to program, and my sons love talking to each other across the house :)

customer_reviews.text: My son loves it and we use it when I’m out back and can’t see him. Great for kids and adults!

customer_reviews.title: Great walkie for the price

It's also easy for him to use. I wasn't sure if it would be too difficult for him to press down on the talk button since his hands were small.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.title: Girls like toys too

customer_reviews.title: These were great for my nephews 5th birthday

customer_reviews.text: My 4yr old grandson has been asking for walkie talkies, i was hesitant to purchase these given his age. Im glad i gave in! Very easy to use, almost no static and grt range. He has hours of fun! This is one of the best purchases ive ever made.

customer_reviews.title: outstanding voice clarity, but I wish they had an auto shutoff.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived early and the quality is excellent. Voice clarity is outstanding. I would rate them 5 stars if they had an automatic shutoff.

customer_reviews.title: Like them, but would have bought something else

Also reflecting on it, should have bought something with a docking station for charging them instead of batteries. Ooops!

product_meta.title: Retevis RT628 Kids Walkie Talkies,22 Channels Long Range Walkie Talkies for Kids Toy with Belt Clip,Two Way Radio Gift for Boys and Girls to Outdoor Adventure Game,Vacation Travel(Silvery,2 Pack)
feature_bullets: Easy to operate for kids;fashionable design and great toy for kids to enjoy with neighbors
This walkie talkie can use optional external microphone and earpiece
LCD backlit display makes things easier in dark environment
2.5mm charge jack for external charger but charger and battery are not included
Many Retevis RT628 walkie talkies will work as long as the walkie talkies are on the same channel and secure call
